      • isActive

        public boolean isActive(int entityId)
        Check if this entity is active.

        Active means the entity is being actively processed.

        Parameters:
        entityId - the entities id
        Returns:
        true if active, false if not

      • getEntity

        protected Entity getEntity(int entityId)
        Resolves entity id to the unique entity instance. This method may return an entity even if it isn't active in the world, use isActive(int) if you need to check whether the entity is active or not.
        Parameters:
        entityId - the entities id
        Returns:
        the entity

      • getActiveEntityCount

        @Deprecated
public int getActiveEntityCount()
        Deprecated. Implement your own manager if you need this functionality. This implementation is stubbed to always return 0.
        Get how many entities are active in this world.
        Returns:
        how many entities are currently active

      • getTotalCreated

        @Deprecated
public long getTotalCreated()
        Deprecated. Implement your own manager if you need this functionality. This implementation is stubbed to always return 0.
        Get how many entities have been created in the world since start.

        Note: A created entity may not have been added to the world, thus created count is always equal or larger than added count.

        Returns:
        how many entities have been created since start

      • getTotalAdded

        @Deprecated
public long getTotalAdded()
        Deprecated. Implement your own manager if you need this functionality. This implementation is stubbed to always return 0.
        Get how many entities have been added to the world since start.
        Returns:
        how many entities have been added

      • getTotalDeleted

public long getTotalDeleted()
        Deprecated. Implement your own manager if you need this functionality. This implementation is stubbed to always return 0.

        how many entities have been deleted since start
